Game List.Name: Truth or Dare or Drink
Game List.Description: A party game where players choose between answering a question truthfully, performing a dare, or taking a drink.
Game List.Rules: Players take turns nominatig themselves to either (a) tell a personal truth, or (b), perform a dare. If they refuse to do either, they must take a drink.

Game List.Name: Cards Against Humanity
Game List.Description: A party game in which players complete fill-in-the-blank statements using words or phrases typically deemed as offensive.
Game List.Rules: One player reads a prompt card, and the other players submit their funniest response cards. The reader chooses the best one.

Game List.Name: 70 Second Scrawls
Game List.Description: A fast-paced drawing game where players have 70 seconds to draw 10 different prompts.
Game List.Rules: Players take turns drawing prompt cards from a deck, and have 70 seconds to draw all 10 prompts. The other players guess what the drawings are. The player with the most correct guesses wins.

Game List.Name: Ultimate Drinking Cards
Game List.Description: A drinking game where players draw cards and follow the instructions on them, which often involve taking drinks or performing dares.
Game List.Rules: Players take turns drawing cards from a deck. Each card has a different instruction, such as taking a drink, giving a drink, or performing a dare. The game continues until players decide to stop.

Game List.Name: Ultimate Smoking Cards
Game List.Description: A smoking game where players draw cards and follow the instructions on them, which often involve taking smokes or performing dares.
Game List.Rules: Players take turns drawing cards from a deck. Each card has a different instruction, such as taking a smoke, giving a smoke, or performing a dare. The game continues until players decide to stop.

Game List.Name: Laughing Hazard
Game List.Description: A party game where players create comic strips using cards with images and captions.
Game List.Rules: Players take turns being the judge and drawing cards to create a comic strip. The judge chooses the funniest combination, and the player with the most points wins.

Game List.Name: Wordshake
Game List.Description: A word game where players try to find as many words as possible in a grid of letters within a time limit.
Game List.Rules: Players shake a grid of lettered dice and then have 3 minutes to find as many words as possible by connecting adjacent letters. Words must be at least 3 letters long.

Game List.Name: Wordsmash
Game List.Description: A fast-paced card game of word association and lightning mental reflexes, Noggin encourages clever and witty responses conjured from two random letters of the alphabet.
Game List.Rules: Players take turns drawing cards and must come up with a word that matches the criteria, and starts with the two letters on the card. The first player to say a word wins the round.

Game List.Name: Spot The Rule
Game List.Description: A math-based puzzle game where players deduce a hidden rule by analyzing number sequences. Play solo against randomized rules or challenge a friend in 2-player mode!
Game List.Rules:
1-Player Mode: The game generates a sequence using a random mathematical rule. Submit any formula (e.g., `(x * 2) + 1`) that correctly produces the sequenceâ€”it doesn't need to match the exact original expression.

2-Player Mode: Player 1 sets a custom rule and starting number. Player 2 sees the generated sequence and must find a working formula (not necessarily identical to Player 1's). Correct solutions win!

Game List.Name: 3 Criteria Challenge
Game List.Description: A game where players must guess a word based on three criteria: a starting letter, a category, and a wildcard rule.
Game List.Rules: Players compete to be the first to guess a word that fits the criteria. The first player to guess correctly wins the round.

Game List.Name: UK Driving Theory Quiz
Game List.Description: A quiz game designed to help players prepare for the UK driving theory test.
Game List.Rules: Players answer multiple-choice questions based on the UK Highway Code and driving theory. The game tracks correct answers and provides feedback.

Game List.Name: Dope Inventions
Game List.Description: A game where players create and pitch their own inventions using product cards.
Game List.Rules: Combine product cards together to create dope new inventions and pitch those inventions to buyers (a. K. A the judge). The dopest invention wins!

Game List.Name: 20 Questions
Game List.Description: A classic guessing game where one player thinks of an object, and the other players ask yes or no questions to guess what it is.
Game List.Rules: One player thinks of an object, and the other players take turns asking yes or no questions. The goal is to guess the object within 20 questions.

Game List.Name: QuipMaster
Game List.Description: A party game where players fill in the blanks of prompts with funny responses, and then vote on the best ones.
Game List.Rules: Players take turns filling in the blanks of prompts with funny responses. The other players vote on their favorite responses, and points are awarded based on the votes received.

Game List.Name: Solitaire
Game List.Description: A classic card game where players sort cards into foundation piles in ascending order by suit.
Game List.Rules: Move all cards to the four foundation piles, building up in suit from Ace to King. Draw cards from the stock and build tableau columns in descending order with alternating colors.

Game List.Name: Peg Solitaire
Game List.Description: A classic board puzzle where players jump pegs to remove them from the board.
Game List.Rules: Jump pegs over adjacent pegs into empty holes, removing the jumped peg. The game is solved when only one peg remains in the center.

Game List.Name: Pong
Game List.Description: The classic arcade game where players bounce a ball back and forth using paddles.
Game List.Rules: Use your paddle to hit the ball past your opponent's paddle. Score points when your opponent misses the ball. First to reach the score limit wins.

Game List.Name: Noun Guesser
Game List.Description: A word game where players must ask up to 20 questions to guess the secret noun.
Game List.Rules: One player thinks of a noun while other players ask yes/no questions to deduce the secret word. Players have up to 20 questions to guess correctly.

Game List.Name: PromptSay
Game List.Description: Players compete to create the funniest scenario using a random word and scenario prompt.
Game List.Rules: A random word and scenario are shown to all players. Each player creates and shares a funny scenario incorporating the word. Players vote on their favorite response.

Game List.Name: Sketch & Seek
Game List.Description: A drawing game where players alternate between drawing prompts and guessing what was drawn.
Game List.Rules: Players draw sketches based on prompts, then other players guess the prompts from the drawings. The next player draws the guessed prompt, creating a chain of interpretation.

Game List.Name: Guess the Persona
Game List.Description: Players guess the role, occupation, character and secret of randomly generated personas.
Game List.Rules: Players receive randomly generated personas with hidden traits. Through questioning and deduction, players try to identify the persona's role and secret.

Game List.Name: Acronymania
Game List.Description: A fun word game where players create hilarious acronyms from random letters.
Game List.Rules: Players receive random letters and must create funny or creative phrases where each word starts with one of the assigned letters. Players vote on the best acronym.

Game List.Name: Kingfall
Game List.Description: A card game where players avoid being the last one holding a King when the deck runs out.
Game List.Rules: Players take turns drawing and playing cards with special actions. The goal is to avoid being the last player holding a King card when no cards remain in the deck.

Game List.Name: Sudoku
Game List.Description: A classic number puzzle where players fill a grid with digits following specific rules.
Game List.Rules: Fill the 9x9 grid so that each row, column, and 3x3 box contains all digits from 1 to 9 without repetition. Start with some numbers pre-filled as clues.

Game List.Name: Debatable
Game List.Description: Beat your friends in debate using the prompt cards drawn
Game List.Rules: Choose an item to argue for each debate topic. Other players may attempt to out-debate you to score the point. First player with 0 cards remaining wins.
